isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - LOW PRESSURE INDICATOR - SERVICE CHECKS

svcsubproc.title: Operation Test
svcsubproc.para: Operation of the pressure switch may be checked with ignition switch on, then by reducing the reservoir pressure and being sure that the contacts close when the reservoir pressure is between 76 psi maximum and 64 psi minimum. The contacts will be closed when warning light or electrical buzzer operates.

svcsubproc.title: Leakage Test
svcsubproc.para: A small vent hole is provided in the cover of the low pressure switch housing to check the condition of the diaphragm. Cover the vent hole with soap solution. If a leak is indicated, replace pressure switch.
